title: eCommerce
shortDescription: Easily sell products, digital items, subscriptions and more.
longDescription:
eCommerce is the easy way to sell digital downloads, physical products and subscriptions in a custom online store. Build beautiful product galleries and use PayPal and Stripe integrations to collect payment for maximum conversions.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr eCommerce?   

* **Sell anything** - whether you’re selling an eBook, a digital music download, a magazine subscription or a physical product, you can sell it online using POWr E-commerce.
* **Boost conversions** - make it easy for your customers to pay using their preferred payment method, whether it’s PayPal, credit card or even offline.
* **Choose your perfect design** - Create a custom product gallery with colors, images, sizing, fonts (and more!) that perfectly match your site.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Sell physical and digital products
* Accept payments via PayPal or Stripe in up to 25 different currencies
* Enable non-electronic payments
* Offer subscriptions and pick custom billing interval
* Digital download buyers get an automatic email with unique download link after payment
* Redirect customers after payment
* Product images and options
* Add custom tax and shipping costs
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language
* Mobile responsive on any device
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins)

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Multiple payment options
* Discount codes
* Lightbox for product images
* Higher file size limits, more products, and more options 
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=ecommerce). 

# Why users love eCommerce:   

"I sell digital eBooks and nothing compares to the app POWr has. It's easy and straight to the point of selling. I have used other apps from POWr and this eCommerce is the best one out there!" - Erik Graphics

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting E-Commerce up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (https://www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc

categories.title: Widgets & Plugins
categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: For businesses looking to test the water with new plugins
products.longDescription:
* 3 eCommerce Products
* 1 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 5MB per File
* 3 Product Images
* 1 Option Groups
* 4 Price Options
* 1 Email Administrators
* Recurring Subscriptions

products.title: Starter
products.shortDescription: For businesses who have their own brand and want extra customization.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Logo
* 5 Ecommerce Products
* 3 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 20MB per File
* 4 Product Images
* 2 Option Groups
* 5 Price Options
* 2 Email Administrators
* Recurring Subscriptions
* 1 Discount Codes
* Collect Custom Order Instructions
* Lightbox Popup

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: For growing businesses looking to stand out from the crowd and get more conversions.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Logo
* 10 Ecommerce Products
* 3 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 100MB per File
* 6 Product Images
* 3 Option Groups
* 10 Price Options
* 3 Email Administrators
* Recurring Subscriptions
* 3 Discount Codes
* Collect Custom Order Instructions
* Lightbox Popup
* Inventory Tracking
* Custom CSS & JavaScript

products.title: Business
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Logo
* Unlimited Ecommerce Products
* 3 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 1GB per File
* Unlimited Product Images
* 20 Option Groups
* Unlimited Price Options
* 20 Email Administrators
* Recurring Subscriptions
* Unlimited Discount Codes
* Collect Custom Order Instructions
* Lightbox Popup
* Inventory Tracking
* Custom CSS & JavaScript
+ FREE Business Upgrade for all 50 POWr Plugins
